fullplot: A widow falls for a guy who bears a striking resemblance to her late husband.
plot: A widow falls for a guy who bears a striking resemblance to her late husband.
title: The Face of Love

tomatoes.consensus: Perhaps worth checking out if only for the opportunity to see reliably powerful work from Annette Bening and Ed Harris, The Face of Love undermines its leads' performances with a scattershot script and aimless direction.
